column5: Hi everyone on WC,has anyone ever fished this lake or have any info on it? I booked it through pickeral arm camps for 2020,its wapesi lake not wapesi bay on lac s.,you can msg here or pm me either way thanks.

I have friends with a boat cache there, have fished it a couple of times in open water and a couple times in the winter. It is a good lake, you will have no problem finding fish. I am sure the camp owners where you are staying will fill you in on where the honey holes are.
Yes I have been to this lake the last 2 years. Are you staying in the North or South Cabin? I have been going to many of the Pickerel Arm Camps for 20+ years. Dan
Danvan im going to the south camp in june and again end of july you can pm me with any details i should know thank you
